title: Ray Josh
author: Ray Josh
content: Earnbitfun is excited to announce the launch of our crypto based gaming platform  "earnbitfun.com". As the name defines, here, you can earn and have fun. The demo version has been launched for the time being to give our players a chance to test and familiarise with the games.Our brand is the reflection of our love for the online players which is the reason why we have invested a lot of our expert manpower on creating interactive games where players can gain relaxation experiences and earn crypto. Our mission is to maintain a safe and secure gaming ambience and ensuring the “fun factor” of all our players. Currently, we have 19 games on board EarnBitFun is also offering a welcome bonus code for the first 100 players where you will be credited instant 100 DOGECOINS from us. To get the bonus, You just need to sign up and create an account, use code C9FEE743 and enjoy 100 DOGE. We provide only the best when it comes to crypto games, bonuses and customer service. This attention to detail ensures that our players receive the highest quality gaming experience possible when playing with us.All you need to do is sign up and create an account, then you can start spinning for free with the demo version. We provide only the best when it comes to crypto games, bonuses, and customer service. Our team’s attention to detail ensures that our players receive the highest quality gaming experience possible when playing with us.So sign up now and Earn a Bit while having Fun!Be the first 100 to get 100 DOGECOIN with the code: C9FEE743Mobile GamingTo all our players who like gaming on the go, you can access the mobile version of the site through a mobile browser. All our games can be played through a smartphone or tablet device or virtually any device that supports a mobile browser.Security and FairnessMembers can play, and rest assured that their personal details and financial transactions are secure as we use SSL encryption and firewalls.All users can directly deposit and or withdraw Bitcoin (BTC), Solana (SOL), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and Litecoin (LTC) through your wallet.SupportIf members need assistance, they can use the casinos live chat facility available round the clock, except during the weekends. Support can also be reached through email and telephone.Find us in social media platforms for latest updates:https://www.facebook.com/earnbitfunhttps://www.instagram.com/earnbitfunhttps://twitter.com/earnbitfun

comments.author: cumakoff
comments.body: Quote from: jocash777 on August 06, 2022, 09:30:04 AMIn payment history i see status successful but i did not receive any doge and when i browse the adress it says 0 doge received why?I have the same

comments.author: cumakoff
comments.body: Quote from: jocash777 on August 06, 2022, 09:52:08 AMQuote from: cumakoff on August 06, 2022, 09:34:29 AMQuote from: jocash777 on August 06, 2022, 09:30:04 AMIn payment history i see status successful but i did not receive any doge and when i browse the adress it says 0 doge received why?I have the same You received anything yet? I did not. And ofcourse the support dont come online anymore lol.0 doge and I'm sure we won't get anything.

comments.author: Omikifuse
comments.body: Give 100 doge bonus just so everyone can see the withdrawals aren't going through would be a bad scam, let's wait and see.

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: Quote from: cumakoff on August 06, 2022, 10:04:28 AMQuote from: jocash777 on August 06, 2022, 09:52:08 AMQuote from: cumakoff on August 06, 2022, 09:34:29 AMQuote from: jocash777 on August 06, 2022, 09:30:04 AMIn payment history i see status successful but i did not receive any doge and when i browse the adress it says 0 doge received why?I have the same You received anything yet? I did not. And ofcourse the support dont come online anymore lol.0 doge and I'm sure we won't get anything.Its a pre-ANN means that the website is still in beta phase, i think the 100 doge bonus was given so that players can test the casino and not to withdraw them. OP didn't really specify that but that's my best guess, unless you want to go as far as calling him a scammer which i think its bit of a overreaction.

comments.author: Ray Josh
comments.body: Hello all players and users,As you can see it is a pre-ann, the 100 doge coin is for testing the platform, it's stability and bugs reporting. We will officially launch the system on the 15th of August, then everyone who participates in the testing of this platform, will receive 100 doge coins directly in their wallet as  a Reward.Till 15th of August, you will get reward in two ways;1. As a participant you will get 100 doge coins after Testing of System2. For reporting bugs on our discord channel, you get 10 doge coins, Our Discord Channel:https://discord.com/invite/gCwt7eZWGdN.B: Some of the doge coin withdrawal we processed was to check the functionality and stability. On 14th August, all balance will be null and participants will be credited 100 doge coins.

comments.author: Jonathonk
comments.body: Thank you dev for updating us.I am also testing .My username is Jonathonk.

comments.author: Ray Josh
comments.body: Quote from: Jonathonk on August 08, 2022, 09:58:12 AMThank you dev for updating us.I am also testing .My username is Jonathonk.Thank you Jonathonk for being part of the testing.

comments.author: mothertoast
comments.body: I just got paid 20 dogecoins for reporting bugs. Thanks admin!

comments.author: cathy davis
comments.body: Just received 50 Doge coins for reporting .Thanks

comments.author: Jonathonk
comments.body: Received some dogecoins as reward. Feeling good to be here ,thanks admin.

comments.author: Jim1X
comments.body: It's funny, the bug reporting channel on discord is empty but there people here claiming to have recieved coins for reporting. where are you guys reporting ?

comments.author: Ray Josh
comments.body: Quote from: Jim1X on August 08, 2022, 01:34:55 PMIt's funny, the bug reporting channel on discord is empty but there people here claiming to have recieved coins for reporting. where are you guys reporting ? On discord DM. If you found any bug, pls report there and get bonus too

comments.author: Jim1X
comments.body: Quote from: Ray Josh on August 08, 2022, 01:52:34 PMQuote from: Jim1X on August 08, 2022, 01:34:55 PMIt's funny, the bug reporting channel on discord is empty but there people here claiming to have recieved coins for reporting. where are you guys reporting ? On discord DM. If you found any bug, pls report there and get bonus tooAh i see. one more thing please, Quote from: Ray Josh on August 08, 2022, 09:54:46 AMall balance will be null and participants will be credited 100 doge coins. [/b]Do all users get 100 doge on august 15th or only bug reporters ?

comments.author: Ray Josh
comments.body: You can redeem promo code to test system with 100 Doge, whoever will test the system by August 14, they will get 100 Doge reward by 15th of AugustFor bug reporting 10 Doge each, directly to personal wallet

comments.author: Jim1X
comments.body: Quote from: Ray Josh on August 08, 2022, 02:04:48 PMYou can redeem promo code to test system with 100 Doge, whoever will test the system by August 14, they will get 100 Doge reward by 15th of AugustFor bug reporting 10 Doge each, directly to personal walletSo from what i understand you don't need to report a bug, only to test out the website before  august 15 ?btw are the 100 doge recieved after August 15 withdrawable or have some conditions on them ?

comments.author: Ray Josh
comments.body: Quote from: Jim1X on August 08, 2022, 02:08:17 PMQuote from: Ray Josh on August 08, 2022, 02:04:48 PMYou can redeem promo code to test system with 100 Doge, whoever will test the system by August 14, they will get 100 Doge reward by 15th of AugustFor bug reporting 10 Doge each, directly to personal walletSo from what i understand you don't need to report a bug, only to test out the website before  august 15 ?btw are the 100 doge recieved after August 15 withdrawable or have some conditions on them ? There is no condition on that reward, you can either withdraw or play with it.N.B: No reward for multiple accounts, if detected

And ofcourse the support dont come online anymore lol.0 doge and I'm sure we won't get anything.Its a pre-ANN means that the website is still in beta phase, i think the 100 doge bonus was given so that players can test the casino and not to withdraw them. OP didn't really specify that but that's my best guess, unless you want to go as far as calling him a scammer which i think its bit of a overreaction.Quote from: Ray Josh on August 08, 2022, 09:54:46 AMHello all players and users,As you can see it is a pre-ann, the 100 doge coin is for testing the platform, it's stability and bugs reporting. We will officially launch the system on the 15th of August, then everyone who participates in the testing of this platform, will receive 100 doge coins directly in their wallet as  a Reward.Till 15th of August, you will get reward in two ways;1. As a participant you will get 100 doge coins after Testing of System2. For reporting bugs on our discord channel, you get 10 doge coins, Our Discord Channel:https://discord.com/invite/gCwt7eZWGdN.B: Some of the doge coin withdrawal we processed was to check the functionality and stability. On 14th August, all balance will be null and participants will be credited 100 doge coins.  So if I understand the site is still under testing/developing and you been allowing deposits ?! What happen if a user deposit and win ?

OP didn't really specify that but that's my best guess, unless you want to go as far as calling him a scammer which i think its bit of a overreaction.Quote from: Ray Josh on August 08, 2022, 09:54:46 AMHello all players and users,As you can see it is a pre-ann, the 100 doge coin is for testing the platform, it's stability and bugs reporting. For reporting bugs on our discord channel, you get 10 doge coins, Our Discord Channel:https://discord.com/invite/gCwt7eZWGdN.B: Some of the doge coin withdrawal we processed was to check the functionality and stability. On 14th August, all balance will be null and participants will be credited 100 doge coins.  So if I understand the site is still under testing/developing and you been allowing deposits ?! What happen if a user deposit and win ?If user make test deposit and plays, either user win or loose, on 15th August it will be rollback to original Balance. It means if someone deposit 100 SOL, and lost it, we will credit back 100 SOL or if user win 100x, we will rollback to 100 SOL.
